name: Rat and Cat
description: Based on a True Story To display the render coat go in Rendering / Environment / Effects tab, click the Hair and Fur. Hairs in the drop-down list, select the "mr prim". Before the renderer need to go in the Rendering tab - Effects, click on the Hair and Fur and choose a lower mr prim mode.
short_description:
Platform:	 3dsMax 2011 + fbx
Render:	 Vray
Size:	 48 MB
Style:	 Modern
Materials:	 Organics, Fur
